document.heading: Cable Television Communications Act of 1981 Clarification Amendment Act of 1983

history.narrative: Law 5-36, “Cable Television Communications Act of 1981 Clarification Amendment Act of 1983,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-170, which was referred to the Committee on Public Services and Consumer Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 21, 1983, and July 5, 1983, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 28, 1983, it was assigned Act No. 5-60 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
